translations: n.比津舞（西印度群岛的马提尼克岛和圣卢西亚岛上的一种土风舞，略似伦巴）

phrs.translation: 贝圭英, 土风舞, 伯格音, 贝桂英
贝古依奈的出发, 比跟舞, 婆娑起舞, 跳起比根舞

sentences.sentence: This is the reason why the Beguine study is always lagging relatively.
sentences.translation: 这也是贝居因研究一直相对滞后的原因。

sentences.sentence: Beguine: a member of any of several lay sisterhoods founded in the Netherlands in the 13th century.
sentences.translation: 贝居安：女修士会修女13世纪建于荷兰的几个凡人修女团体的成员。

sentences.sentence: Beguine: a member of any of several lay sisterhoods founded in the Netherlands in the 13 th century.
sentences.translation: 贝居安：女修士会修女13世纪建于荷兰的几个凡人修女团体的成员。
